title: Thucydides and The Peloponnesian War
description:
THE DAWN OF POLITICAL HISTORY - Thucydides and the Peloponnesian War
8 lectures by Professor Fred. E. Baumann for the Modern Scholar series
Released 2012 on 4 CDs

8 MP3 files @ 128 kbps

Professor Baumann works through the 8 books of the History of the Peloponnesian War by Thucydides, which he describes as perhaps the best book on politics ever written.  It will help to read the subject text as you go, or to have read the book before embarking on this course of lectures. In any event you will be immersed in the world of ancient Greece for nearly 5 hours.  Hope you enjoy it and take something away from the experience!

There is no Modern Scholar course guide for this series of lectures.
